Synopsis:
Daigo Kobayashi, a former cellist in an orchestra that has just been dissolved, just wandering the streets without work and without much hope. So he decided to return to his hometown with his wife. They get a job as a gravedigger: clean the bodies, placed in his coffin and sent to the other world in the best possible way. Although his wife and neighbors viewed with displeasure this job, Daigo discover in this ritual of death the vital spark that was missing from his life.
